title: Web scraping and insertion into database
snippet:
Hi, I'm after some developers to build a web scraper for me. 

It needs to open:

http://www.trademe.co.nz/browse/categoryattributesearchresults.aspx?sort_order=expiry_desc&136=&153=&132=PROPERTY&49=0&49=0&122=0&122=0&29=&123=0&123=0&search=1&sidebar=1&cid=5748&rptpath=350-5748-&216=0&216=0&217=0&217=0&v=List

and add all the latest houses to a database, then go into each listing and extract all the photos and information about each listing, including real estate agent. 

This will be developed/run on an AWS instance of your choosing.   I would prefer mysql as I am familiar with this, and python (or maybe php) for the code.
